text: I agree. Compare a game like Z1 full of instant-death hazards, a harsh as hell ranking system, plus a grand total of 4000+ e-crystals required for some of the cyber elves, which are single-use, hard to get, miss-able, AND give a hit to your score in a mission, not worth it since enemies will only drop 16 e-crystals at most and 5 at least. In the words of the lore channel, Have fun!

author: girascorpion

text:
ZX is way too underrated a series. Most dismissed it simply because X & Zero are now costumes for new characters to wear...so? Mega Man is best for sharp, precise excellent gameplay, and these games are just the Mega Man Zero games except at a difficulty people most can actually handle.
Fun to play, great looking, creative bosses/environments, power stealing, and excellent music. These are what make Mega Man and this has all of those so...why is this series so bad again?
